All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Article
A product sold by a legal entity and referenced in an invoice or an invoice line.
ArticleCode
Defines the product categories we offer in our shop.
Invoice
The abstraction of an invoice with a set of positions, subtotals, and a total.
InvoiceAsciiDoc
Provides support to generate a AsciiDoc representation of an invoice for the Swiss market.
InvoiceGenerator
The invoice generator abstraction generates a output document based on the provided invoice and optional configuration fields.
InvoiceItem
The invoice item represent a position of sold items defined through a product.
InvoiceJson
 
InvoiceLegalEntity
Defines a legal entity addressed in an invoice.
InvoiceLine
The invoice line represents one line or position in an invoice.
InvoiceQrCode
 
InvoicesAdapter
Invoice adapter is an adapter for the invoice port defined as a secondary port.
InvoicesBoundedDomain
 
InvoicesBusinessLogic
The business logic and rules of the bounded domain of invoices entities.
InvoicesEntities
 
InvoicesHandler
Defines the import port for the invoices bounded domain.
InvoicesHdl
Define the workflow defined for bounded domain activities in particular the import and export of files.
InvoicesPort
Defines the export port for the invoices bounded domain.
InvoicesRealm
Handles the invoices subsystem entities.
InvoicesTsvJsonHdl
Provide import and export functions for invoice entities persisted in tab separated files.
InvoicesUtilities
 
InvoiceZugFerd
 
Subtotal
The subtotal defines the sum for a set of positions in the invoice.
